channel.title: --Mage Pure-- w/ Aryan
channel.description:
I am thinking of making a mage pure to have some fun and own some noobs in thw wild.
I am thinking of doing it like this:
Autoing a bunch of ess, enough to start maging legit, then taking that "unpure" ess and making a bunch of air runes (all on Aryan), and getting a staff of w/e so I can cast wind strikes.
Do you think this is a good idea? Or should I make a ranger, I AM NOT A MEMBER.
Some people say that mages suck when they train with a staff because you have to level up a combat skill such as def, att, str. I am thinking I will use Defence so no one can hit on me.
Please post all you comments on this/Or if you think this is a bad idea. Thx!

Lol, tell me your mage pure name in a PM we can train together…

no u dnt need a skill such as attack str or def lol just keep it on attack and train with wind strike but if you train on def you WILL get def make a mage =)
